column1: 7117,Textile and Footwear Production Machine Operators,,"Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment
column3: Inspect textile, hide or leather products
column9: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column11: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column13: Cut fabrics, textiles, leather or hide
column19: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column21: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column23: Program equipment to perform production tasks
column25: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column35: Conduct test runs of production equipment
column37: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column39: Install mechanical components in production equipment
column41: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column43: Clean materials to prepare them for production",0.1900854747553162
